Statistics
How do you feel?
Username
Password
Login
Do you feel sad or unhappy? \n(1= very unhappy, 5=happy)
Are you reluctant or unsatisfied? \n(1=reluctant/unsatisfied, 5=satisfied)
Do you feel more tired than usual? \n(1=very tired, 5=not tired that usual)
Do you feel like you get enough sleep? \n(1=not enough, 5=plenty enough)
Do you feel guilt? \n(1=constant guilt, 5=no guilt)
Do you feel like you have failed as a person? \n(1=I have failed, 5=no, I feel fine)
Do you get tired quicker that usual? \n(1=yes, I wake up tired, 5=no, I feel fine)
Are you as functional as you used to? \n(1=I cannot function at all, 5=I feel fine)
Are you feeling indecisive? \n(1=yes, I cannot decide anything, 5=no)
Are you unable to concentrate as you used to? \n(1=yes, I cannot concentrate, 5=no)
Has there been changes in you appetite? \n(1=yes a lot, 5=no changes)
Has your views on your own health changed? \n(1=Yes, I don not care anymore, 5=no change)
Do you feel that you are less interested in sexual activities? \n(1=yes, no interest, 5=no)
Do you feel you have enough meaningful relationships? \n(1=I feel that I am alone, 5=I do)
Have you been paying attention to your diet? \n(1=I don not care, 5=yes, I eat healthy)
Do you feel healthy? \n(1=no, 5=yes)
Have you had more headaches than usually? \n(1=yes, 5=no)
Do you feel ugly/unattractive? \n(1=yes, 5=no)
Have cried more than usual? \n(1=cannot cry anymore, 5=no)
Do you want to harm yourself? \n(1=yes, 5=no)
